body_html:
Hello, thanks for response,
That is clear enough that crash at MustCallDeferred func. But how to fix that not clear.
As you can see name is kind of "memory trash".

Are you registering any custom operations?

No,

Is it possible that there is some memory stomping happening ...

Yes you are right, but I am calling TF_NewGraph() and all memory management encapsulated in c_api.cc.

body:
Hello, thanks for response, 
 That is clear enough that crash at  MustCallDeferred func. But how to fix that not clear. 
As you can see `name` is kind of "memory trash".
>Are you registering any custom operations?

No,

>Is it possible that there is some memory stomping happening ...

Yes you are right, but I am calling `TF_NewGraph()` and all memory management encapsulated in c_api.cc.
